pinitial.text: Have a look and discover the information about my personal skills, my academic experience and my technical abilities.

pfinal.text:
My educational background and work experience make me a talented and bright person with potential and motivation.
Working on multiple fields in different countries in Europe has provide me with technical abilities to make innovative, varied and adaptable projects.

pinitial.text: Find out all the information about my work experience in the fields of web development and architecture.

I invite you to have a look on the google API map to check my european work placements.

pinitial.text:
Here I define myself as a very hard-working, very creative, self-learner, team-player and ambitious person.
In addition I include my language skills and my hobbits.

item1.text: Highly creative design sense that strengthen the conception of innovative projects. // Innovative problem-solver that generate workable solutions and resolve complaints.

item2.text: Analytical thinking for identifying, scrutinizing, improving, and streamlining complex work processes. // Strong willingness to learn. // Ability to manage multiple assignments and tasks, set priorities, adapt to changing conditions and reach the goals in time.
